casebody.data:
August 5, 2010

[Cite as 08/05/2010 Case Announcements #2, 2010-Ohio-3605.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-1360. In re Z.N.

Franklin App. No. 10AP-85, 2010-Ohio-2910. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal involving termination of parental rights/adoption. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
